battlesys
Class Move

java.lang.Object
  battlesys.Move
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoveAbilitySplit, MoveAbilitySwap, MoveChangeAbility, MoveNormal, MoveRandom, MoveTransferStatus
public abstract class Move
extends java.lang.Object

Generic move class - The root of the Move Hirerachy.

noKeepStat

protected boolean noKeepStat
Whether stat should be keep. Used by ChargeAtk (status infliction), which, when used, do no keep stat, but the real attack

Whether the player faints after using the move

ignoreHp

protected boolean ignoreHp
whether the target's hp should be ignored. Normally this move cannot be applied to whose hp is 0 or below.

getInitialMoveTime

public final int getInitialMoveTime()

basicAtkOnly

protected final boolean basicAtkOnly()
Determine whether the owner can only use basic moves, as used by checkUsable methods It checks whether the owner has enough move time, is it disabled, and whether the attack is actually bought by the owner. Does not check whether the move is basic

Returns:

preMove

protected final java.lang.String preMove()
Processing done before every move. All moves are required to call this method before their processing starts. This method currently returns the usage of this move.

postMove

protected final void postMove(java.util.List<SingleMoveResult> result)
Processing done after every move. All moves are required to call this method after their processing ends. This method currently shows sets that the owner has moved, and keep stat

Parameters:
result - The List of MoveResult returned by the useMove method, used for keep stat

useMove

protected abstract java.util.List<SingleMoveResult> useMove(Player user,
                                                            Player target,
                                                            PlayerList attackers,
                                                            PlayerList defenders)
                                                     throws BattleSysException
Make the user use the move against the target This method is meant to be used on Move** level

Parameters:
user -
target -
attackers - The PlayerList for the attacking side
defenders - The PlayerList for the defending side
Returns:
List of results for every single attack of the move.
Throws:
BattleSysException

useMove

public abstract CompleteMoveResult useMove(Player target,
                                           PlayerList attackers,
                                           PlayerList defenders)
                                    throws BattleSysException
Make the owner use the move against the target This method is meant to be used by others

Parameters:
target -
attackers - The PlayerList for the attacking side
defenders - The PlayerList for the defending side
Returns:
List of results for every single attack of the move.
Throws:
BattleSysException

loadMoves

public static final void loadMoves()
Load the moves in the move folder. They can be accessed by getMove method. If moves are already loaded this method does nothing.

getMove

public static final Move getMove(java.lang.String name)
                          throws InvalidMoveNameException
Convert a given name of the move to an actual move object (Not the one in the bought move object) Used to obtain information about the move, instead of using move object as owned by a player. If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Parameters:
name - The name of the attack, e.g. BasicAtk. Case insensitive.
Returns:
Throws:
InvalidMoveNameException - Thrown when the move specified by name parameter does not exist

getAllMoves

public static final java.util.List<Move> getAllMoves()
Get all the moves available. If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Returns:

getAllPublicMoves

public static final java.util.List<Move> getAllPublicMoves()
Get all the moves that can be bought and is usable by "public" If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Returns:

getAllBuyableMoves

public static final java.util.List<Move> getAllBuyableMoves()
Get all the moves that can be bought If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Returns:

getAllRandomMoves

public static final java.util.List<Move> getAllRandomMoves()
Get the moves that are for MoveRandom moves. It will give moves except those not usable due to randomMoves or not buyable moves. If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Returns:

getMoveCount

public static final int getMoveCount()
Get number of moves loaded. If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Returns:

public static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNamesOfAllMoves(boolean includeUnbuyableMoves)
Get all the Simple Class names of all the moves If moves are not loaded this will do loading.

Parameters:
includeUnbuyableMoves - Whether to include moves that are not buyable
Returns:

public static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNamesOfAllMoves()
